reasoning_log:
The dataset contained 16 descriptions and 16 images, requiring a perfect 1:1 match. Initial sorting was based on room type (Kitchen, Bathroom, Balcony, Bedrooms). Ambiguities arose primarily in the Living Room (3 images) and Dining/Entrance areas (5 images). These were resolved by focusing on highly specific tags:
1. Bedrooms: Desc_12 was uniquely matched to Image_12 due to '雙面採光' (dual-aspect windows).
2. Kitchens: Desc_5 (good ventilation/light) was matched to Image_5 (external door/window), while Desc_14 (narrow, medium light) was matched to Image_14 (narrow, looking back into the hallway).
3. Living Rooms: Desc_3 was matched to Image_3 (direct view of the '大面陽台落地窗'). Desc_16 (TV wall storage) was matched to Image_1, which clearly frames the TV cabinet. Desc_1 (public/private separation) was matched to Image_16, which provides the widest view of the overall flow.
4. Dining/Entrance: Desc_4 ('獨立用餐區') was matched to Image_4, which is framed by doorways. Desc_7 ('收納量大') was matched to Image_8, which best highlights the large entrance storage cabinet. The remaining dining shots (Image_2, Image_7) were matched based on flow and proximity to storage/display walls.

matching_result_list.evidence: Wider view of the public area, emphasizing the overall square layout and the separation between public and private zones ('公私領域分明').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(前陽台大面窗), 公領域開闊(客餐廳連成一體), 家具動線順暢(沙發與茶几間距足夠), 電視牆收納完整(櫃體與層板已做), 新裝修狀態(牆面與地磚無明顯磨損), 可視為家庭活動核心(沙發區連結餐廳與走道)

matching_result_list.evidence: Shows the dining area integrated with the living room ('餐客一體') with clear, smooth circulation space.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 餐客互通(方便家庭聚會), 採光良好(面向前陽台方向), 層高尚可(吊燈不壓迫), 家具尺寸合宜(四人桌仍保有走道), 牆面可做展示或收納(目前留白)

matching_result_list.evidence: Direct, wide shot facing the large sliding glass door, confirming '大面陽台落地窗' and '視野外推陽台'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 玄關落塵區明確(入口與室內有視覺區隔), 收納量大(整面木作櫃體), 採光由客廳引入(避免玄關過暗), 動線順暢(直通餐廳與客廳), 插座預留(櫃旁可放路由器或家電)

matching_result_list.evidence: Focuses on the substantial wooden cabinet structure near the entrance, confirming '收納量大'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 有對外窗(良好通風與採光), 乾濕分離(淋浴區設低檻區隔), 衛浴設備新穎(馬桶與洗手台新型), 收納基本(鏡櫃與下方櫃體), 牆地磚防水(全室貼磚降漏水風險), 空間比例適中(如廁與淋浴各有區塊)

matching_result_list.evidence: Empty bedroom showing windows on two adjacent walls, confirming '雙面採光'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 雙面採光(轉角兩面窗), 通風極佳(易形成穿堂風), 方正格局(四角完整好規劃家具), 空間寬裕(可放雙人床與衣櫃), 牆面留白(方便加裝收納或書桌)

matching_result_list.evidence: Empty bedroom with a single large window, fitting the description of a '方正實用' secondary room.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(單大窗引入自然光), 方正實用(適合規劃書房或兒童房), 牆面完整(可做整面衣櫃), 層高正常(無明顯壓樑), 安靜感佳(看起來朝內側中庭)

matching_result_list.evidence: Narrow, galley-style kitchen ('狹長型格局') with the view looking back toward the hallway, suggesting '採光中等'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 全配備流理臺(瓦斯爐+排油煙機+上櫃), 狹長型格局(料理動線線性清楚), 通風尚可(一側有窗門向外), 採光中等(自然光主要來自端部), 新裝修(櫥櫃五金與面材新), 插座配置足夠(檯面上多組插座)

matching_result_list.evidence: Exterior shot of the balcony with a tiled railing and wood-look floor, confirming '安全欄牆' and '可用曬衣空間'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 可用曬衣空間(長條型走道適合曬衣架), 半戶外設計(有遮雨棚可防雨), 安全欄牆(磚牆高度足夠防墜), 地面易打理(磁磚+木紋地板), 觀景一般(面鄰棟距離中等偏近)

matching_result_list.evidence: Focuses on the long, low TV cabinet and surrounding wall, confirming '電視牆收納完整' and the central position of the living area.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(前陽台大面窗), 公領域開闊(客餐廳連成一體), 家具動線順暢(沙發與茶几間距足夠), 電視牆收納完整(櫃體與層板已做), 新裝修狀態(牆面與地磚無明顯磨損), 可視為家庭活動核心(沙發區連結餐廳與走道)
